column5: @art_burke @healthbyjames You think your retort is meaningful, despite more than enough evidence that the Fosun, China mRNA shots did more harm than good. But keep cheerleading for Chinese bioweapons, and by all means keep taking the shots you think work well. Feel free to explain why the CCP won’t allow.

@IrinaHeaver I worked my way through MIT doing this job, in the Austin chalk, for Mitchell Energy and Development. Crushed my right hand and broke the four finger on my last day a day before classes started. Took me years of washing dishes for 40 people to fully recover use of my hand.

@healthbyjames 91% of Biden voters have received the COVID vaccine. Can someone do the math and estimate how many will get cancer? Is there any advice, medical or otherwise, to a politician’s supporters that got more killed than his claim that “the vaccines are PERFECTLY safe and effective?”
@art_burke @healthbyjames So what? Are you sleeping in a cave and unaware that anyone who points out any of the many problems with vaccines has a board harassing them with this tactic?

@yurucharafan @healthbyjames The stupidity of this comment is that the only truth about the dangers of the shot came from social media. Doctors lied and continue to lie. Imagine getting your medical advice from people who recommended four shots.
@amandacassatt Can’t wait to buy a book full and give them to people who could benefit from your wisdom, Amanda

@regardthefrost Zhengli Shi is the creator of SARS-CoV-WIV1 through SARS-Cov-WIV16. She is a People’s Liberation Army biowarfare specialist. Her title for years, until Ministry of Propaganda people altered her Wikipedia page in March 2020, was “Director of Disease Engineering.”

@JackPosobiec I said all this and more in January 2020. All that a person has to do is read Zhengli Xi’s papers from mid-2018. She says that ‘lungs were resistant to SARS so I changed amino acid sequences from X to Y and I was able to attach to the ACE2 receptor and enter the lungs’
